title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
### Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Count

**Overview:**
Experience a new level of clean with Amazon's own Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels. Designed to handle the toughest of messes, Presto! paper towels offer versatility and superior absorbency, ensuring you use less and save more. This pack includes 12 huge rolls, equivalent to 38 regular rolls, each with the flexibility to tear off the size you need, reducing waste and providing the convenience you deserve.

**Product Features:**
- **Pack Contents:** 12 huge rolls, divided into two packs of 6 for easy storage.
- **Sheet Size:** Each roll boasts 158 2-ply sheets, combining strength and softness for optimal performance.
- **Flex-a-Size Technology:** Customize the size of the towel you need for the task at hand with the innovative Flex-a-Size perforations.
- **Absorbency:** Presto! Paper Towels are up to 75% more absorbent compared to leading 1-ply brands, allowing you to tackle spills and messes with confidence.
- **Sheet Comparison:** With each huge roll containing 158 sheets, you're getting the equivalent of 38 regular rolls, based on a regular roll having 49 sheets.
- **Trusted Quality:** Compare them to your favorite Bounty Paper Towels and notice the difference, not only in performance but also in value.
- **Color:** Classic white, perfect for any kitchen or cleaning scenario.
- **Brand Assurance:** Amazon Brand - Presto! is committed to providing the highest quality with a focus on customer satisfaction.

Whether it's a small spill or a big cleanup, Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels have you covered. Stock up your home with these ultra-absorbent, flexibly-sized paper towels and enjoy a premium cleaning experience at a fraction of the cost of name brands. Add Presto! to your cart today and step into a world of cleanliness and efficiency.

- **Superior Absorbency:** These towels are up to 75% more absorbent compared to the leading 1-ply brand, tackling spills and messes with ease.
- **Economical Choice:** With each huge roll equivalent to over 3 regular rolls, you get an impressive total equivalent of 38 regular rolls.
- **Gentle Yet Strong:** Soft to the touch but tough on messes, Presto! paper towels are suitable for a variety of cleaning tasks.
- **Eco-conscious Packaging:** Comes in two packs of 6 rolls each, reducing packaging waste and making storage more convenient.

Whether you're mopping up spills, wiping down counters, or cleaning windows, Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels are the reliable choice for your cleaning needs. Order now and experience the perfect combination of strength, flexibility, and value that only Presto! can deliver.
